title: Andy Previewed Dragon Age: The Veilguard
description:
Andy couldn't be happier. 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5SOQS64AKHs 

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.
